overview: Nathan is Enspire’s chief writer and instructional designer. With his storytelling approach to learning, Nathan has developed and documented Enspire’s unique and award-winning approach to instructional design. He is responsible for training and guiding Enspire’s product development team and has led instructional design workshops at leading industry conferences, including the E-Learning Producer Conference, and at distinguished companies such as National Instruments. Nathan holds bachelor’s degrees in mathematics, philosophy, and liberal arts honors from the University of Texas at Austin.
